actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to reduce the amount of certain Federal-aid highway funds for any State in which the minimum age for the purchase or public possession of alcoholic beverages is less than twenty-one years.
short_title: Uniform Minimum Drinking Age Act of 1984

summary.text: Uniform Minimum Drinking Age Act of 1984 - Requires the Secretary of Transportation to reduce a State's apportionment of Federal-aid highway funds by increments of five percent for every fiscal year during which the minimum drinking age in such State is less than 21 years.

titles.title: Uniform Minimum Drinking Age Act of 1984

A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to reduce the amount of certain Federal-aid highway funds for any State in which the minimum age for the purchase or public possession of alcoholic beverages is less than twenty-one years.
